messages.content: ComfyUI-PNG-Metadata is a set of custom nodes for ComfyUI that allows users to add custom metadata to PNG files, such as the prompt and settings used to generate the image.
How can the metadata added by ComfyUI-PNG-Metadata be used?
The metadata added by ComfyUI-PNG-Metadata can be used to add 'parameters' metadata item compatible with AUTOMATIC1111 metadata.
How can you use the nodes provided by ComfyUI-PNG-Metadata?
To use the nodes, you simply add them to your workflow and connect the inputs. This will automatically add the metadata to any standard 'save image' nodes.
What nodes are provided in the ComfyUI-PNG-Metadata library?
The nodes provided in the ComfyUI-PNG-Metadata library are 'Set Metadata' and 'Set Metadata (All)'.
What is the function of the 'Set Metadata' node in ComfyUI-PNG-Metadata?
The 'Set Metadata' node in ComfyUI-PNG-Metadata sets a single custom metadata field and optionally updates the 'parameters' field in PNG metadata.
What is the function of the 'Set Metadata (All)' node in ComfyUI-PNG-Metadata?
The 'Set Metadata (All)' node in ComfyUI-PNG-Metadata sets multiple metadata at once and writes them to the 'parameters' field in PNG metadata.
What is a known issue with the node execution order in ComfyUI-PNG-Metadata?

Currently, the node execution order is not enforced in ComfyUI-PNG-Metadata. If Metadata nodes execute after the Save Image node, the metadata will not be written to the image. This will be fixed in a future release.
